html:
5.12.17  4:37 pm   What's the password? To my diary

     i don't know

5.12.17  4:36 pm   Could you start uploading short videos (<1 minute) again now that you're back.

     i didn't leave

5.12.17  4:24 pm   Does this question thing actually work

     yes
5.12.17  4:19 pm   Baby Swiss, or Provolone Cheese?

5.12.17  4:11 pm   what do you like about the stop sign?

     it has very clear instructions. although to be honest it doesn't really tell you what to do next

5.12.17  4:09 pm   Are you secretly a sock

     no

5.12.17  3:59 pm   Why are chords so beautiful?

     because they represent meaning

5.12.17  3:58 pm   did you record the "ngeh... ngeh.. ngeh" sound of the fish trying to go on land on the first try

     i probably did maybe 5 to 7, and then took the best 3, and then spaced them out to the exact timing i established in the temp-demo when i wrote it
5.12.17  3:57 pm   which font do you use in your videos?
5.12.17  3:53 pm   Are you going on tour any time soon? Maybe to a grocery store near me?

5.12.17  3:15 pm   what was the order of the steps u took in making the hotwig?

     there is a progress report of both history videos posted somewhere on my instagram which is roughly accuarate. i have also probably explained the entire process in excrutiating detail a few times on this questions page but i don't know where

5.12.17  3:03 pm   Would you be willing to make a hilarious-yet-oddly-informative video on how to do music good?

     yes. i have done 3 short ones already but i would like to go much more in depth, in the future

5.12.17  2:53 pm   do you ever just faceplant into your keyboard out of frustration

     oh hell yeah

5.12.17  2:50 pm   do yuo need help dealing with the nightmares of universe creation?

     oh hell yeah

5.12.17  2:45 pm   Was hotewig the first project where you've done 3D modeling?

     yes

     It was really impressive how nicely that globe moved around

     thnaks

5.12.17  2:39 pm   What is your least favorite thing?

     being asked to dislike something

5.12.17  2:33 pm   what questions do you answer

     there is a list of all the questions i have answered, here

5.12.17  2:32 pm   are you a fraud

     no

5.12.17  2:30 pm   Could computers think?

     sort of. they are getting better

5.12.17  2:18 pm   how best can I coordinate my left-hand vibrato with my right-hand bowing?

     i think you just bow steadily and do the vibrato with your left hand? i'm not sure i don't play any bowed instruments. but this is the kind of thing you will surely learn naturally the more time you spend enjoying your instrument, and playing what you want to play. and then soon people will ask you how you do the vibrato thing and you will have no idea how to explain it

5.12.17  2:16 pm   are you gonna post something to reality soon?

     yes

5.12.17  2:01 pm   When are you making more of those monday videos, albums, songs, and music videos? Also, can you do the documentary about how climate works? (if optional) (because I have a climate test coming soon.)

     i'm going to try to do as many things as possible, as soon as possible. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.12.17  2:00 pm   Why did you choose to do a single, concise video on the history of the world, rather than breaking up your experience into a bunch of smaller, 5-10 minute videos?

     i guess i wanted more of a thrill, and a challenge

5.12.17  2:00 pm   Do you know the answer to this question?

     i guess i'll just have to make one up

5.12.17  1:55 pm   why are you so fun?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

5.12.17  1:34 pm   what does john travolta mean

     that's the name of a famous actor. it might mean other things too i'm not sure

5.12.17  1:22 pm   Will you start uploading more longer form videos from now on? Not all of them have to be nearly as long as your most recent one (obviously lol), but I and many of your new subscribers (congrats on that btw) would love to see more frequent few minute long videos.

     it's impossible to upload several minute videos frequently. the one i just uploaded took 11 months, and i was working on it every day as fast as possible. i hope that makes sense

5.12.17  12:26 pm   are you uploading regularly now that history of the world's finished?

     i will continue working on content non-stop, just as i have for the last several years. and uploading the finished content to the appropriate place(s) immediately when it's done. i'm not sure if that answers your question
5.12.17  12:21 pm   Apples or pears?

5.12.17  12:02 pm   What are your thoughts on the universe being built on Yin and yang, negative and positive polarities?

     i guess that's one way to look at it
5.12.17  11:58 am   why japan

5.12.17  11:51 am   Do you plan on releasing your own song or whatever? you're musically very talented I guess.

     i have been doing songs for many years, but i will do even more, in the future
5.12.17  11:38 am   Why the heck is questions spelt like that in the title of this page?

5.12.17  11:38 am   When will this question be answered?

     now, i guess

5.12.17  11:37 am   Do you have any other Hobbies besides youtube?

     youtube is not really one of my hobbies

5.12.17  11:33 am   do you ever plan on making more songs?

     oh hell yeah

5.12.17  11:32 am   Did u assumend my gender?

     no

5.12.17  11:28 am   when and why did you do that thing? ive been thinking on it for a while and im pretty stumped.

     which thing

5.12.17  11:17 am   What was the hardest part of making the last video?

     figuring out how to leave out 95% of the details and have the least amount of people mad at me for it

5.12.17  11:08 am   Was more info on Britain/the British Empire ever in one of your drafts for History of the World?

     yes. there was more info on everything

5.12.17  11:03 am   are you only going to use youtube as your platform now?

     no

     or do you think you'll release your songs elsewhere?

     oh hell yeah

5.12.17  10:55 am   do you plan on doing any other non-song projects? not like massive history of videos, just like lil 5 minute things or whatever

     oh hell yeah
5.12.17  10:51 am   why did you stop the reality videos?

5.12.17  10:42 am   do you ever justnearwngiuehgneurshk

     oh hell yeah
5.12.17  10:39 am   do you answer everyone's questions

5.12.17  10:38 am   i think the rule for how many songs there should be is as many as humanely possible :)

     ah, i agree

5.12.17  10:37 am   What sort of videos do you have in mind for later?

     i can't tell you
5.12.17  10:23 am   are you answering all the questions

5.12.17  10:19 am   Why prefer an original painting to an excellent copy?

     the original probably has all the special powers. hauntings, curses, etc

5.12.17  10:14 am   Is gardening art?

     oh hell yeah
